body: I found this a little surprising. If I say `narrow(self, 0, 999999999, 0)`, where `self.size(0) == 10`, this code will report now "length out of range", which... seems like it's missing the point.
body_html: I found this a little surprising. If I say narrow(self, 0, 999999999, 0), where self.size(0) == 10, this code will report now "length out of range", which... seems like it's missing the point.
